scripts.stack:start: docker-compose --profile core -f ./ops/docker-compose.yml up --build -d && sleep 30 && docker-compose --profile baseline -f ./ops/docker-compose.yml up --build -d && sleep 30
scripts.stack:stop: docker-compose -f ./ops/docker-compose.yml down && docker volume rm ops_provide-db && docker volume rm ops_prvd-baseline-db
